Name: Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB RAM)
Description: Main control unit for arena systems, vision processing, and communication.

Name: Raspberry Pi 5 27W USB-C Power Supply
Description: Official power for RPi5.

Name: SanDisk Extreme 64GB microSD Card (A2 rated)
Description: High-speed storage for RPi OS, vision software, and data.

Name: OV5640 USB Camera Module (5MP)
Description: Two identical cameras for stereo AprilTag tracking.

Name: Powered USB 3.0 Hub (7-port with external PSU)
Description: Powers and manages data for two cameras, connected to RPi5.

Name: WS2812B Addressable LED Strip (IP65, 5m, 60 LEDs/m)
Description: Perimeter lighting (total 15m, cut to fit 3x3m perimeter + spares).

Name: ESP32 Development Board (e.g., ESP32-WROOM-32)
Description: Microcontroller for LED strip control.

Name: 5V 10A Power Supply (for LEDs)
Description: High-current power for LED strips.

Name: Sumo Competition Mat (3x3m, durable vinyl)
Description: Official size mat with sumo markings.

Name: Aluminum Extrusion (20x20mm, 1m lengths)
Description: Modular frame for overhead camera rig (can be disassembled).

Name: Aluminum Extrusion Connectors & Brackets
Description: For assembling the camera rig frame.

Name: Referee Laptop Stand (Folding/Adjustable)
Description: Portable stand for referee's laptop.

Name: Arduino Leonardo/Pro Micro (for button panel)
Description: Acts as a USB HID device for referee button panel.

Name: Arcade Push Buttons (various colors)
Description: Durable buttons for referee actions.

Name: Small Breadboard/Perfboard & Jumper Wires
Description: For custom button panel wiring.

Name: I2C OLED Display (128x32/128x64)
Description: For referee timer display.

Name: Multi-Port USB Charging Station (min. 4 ports, 40W+)
Description: Dedicated charging for 2 robots simultaneously plus spares.

Name: Modular Foam Safety Panels (1x0.5m, stackable)
Description: Creates a safety perimeter around the arena.

Name: Heavy-Duty Utility Cart (Folding/Wheeled)
Description: For transport and storage of all components.

Name: Stackable Plastic Storage Bins (various sizes)
Description: Organizes small parts, cables, and tools.

Name: P10 LED Matrix Panels (32x16 pixels, RGB)
Description: Build a large scoreboard (e.g., 64x32 pixels total).

Name: Hub75 LED Matrix Driver Board (ESP32-based)
Description: Controller for the P10 LED matrix panels.

Name: 5V 20A Power Supply (for Scoreboard)
Description: Powers the scoreboard LED panels.

Name: Gigabit Ethernet Switch (5-port)
Description: Wired network for RPi5 and potential referee laptop.

Name: Ethernet Cables (various lengths)
Description: For RPi5 to switch, switch to wall, etc.

Name: Assorted USB Cables (Type A-C, A-Micro B)
Description: For robot charging, RPi5 peripherals.

Name: Cable Management Ties (Velcro/Zip Ties)
Description: For organizing all cables.
